name: 雨果·富尔特斯
name_full: 雨果·富尔特斯 Hugo Fuertes
introduction: Hugo Fuertes is a young Spanish actor, who at just 15 years old has worked in numerous film, television, and theater productions. He made his debut when he was only 2 years old and has appeared in series such as "El Accidente", "Desaparecidos", "Señoras del Hampa", "Hernán" or "Bosé" and in films such as "Las ovejas no pierden el tren" or "Malasaña 32", among other. He has also participated in international productions such as "The penguin lessons", "The solitude" or "Genius Picasso" by National Geographic. His acting training began at the age of 7 at the Municipal School of Dramatic Art in Madrid and he is currently continuing his training at On-Set. Among his skills, his sportsmanship stands out; He practices soccer, surfing, skiing, and tennis, and with his passion for music, he plays the guitar.
